bill_title: to appropriate money for the repair of certain small dams.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to appropriate money for the repair of certain small dams. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the public lands weed and pest fund the sum of one hundred sixty thousand dollars ($160,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Department of School and Public Lands. Notwithstanding the provisions of § 38-20A-9.1 or any other provision of law, the money appropriated in this section shall be used for the repair of dams on lands under the jurisdiction of the Department of School and Public Lands. Section 2. The commissioner of school and public lands shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 1999, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
